org.retal.logiweb.service

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.retal.logiweb.service.UserService

  • public class UserService
extends Object
    Service, containing business-logic methods regarding User and UserInfo entities.
    Author:
    Alexander Retivov

      • addNewUser

        public void addNewUser(User user,
                       BindingResult bindingResult,
                       String password)
        Validates and adds new user to database.
        Parameters:
        user - User to be added
        bindingResult - object to store validation result
        password - not hashed password to be validated

      • deleteUser

        public String deleteUser(int id)
        Deletes user from database by ID.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of user to be deleted

      • deleteUser

        public String deleteUser(User target)
        Deletes user from database.
        Parameters:
        target - user to be deleted
        Returns:
        redirect address (for controllers) if method invoker has no rights to delete target user

      • updateUser

        public String updateUser(User updatedUser,
                         BindingResult bindingResult,
                         String password)
        Updates user in database.
        Parameters:
        updatedUser - user to be updates
        bindingResult - object to store validation result
        password - not hashed password to be validated
        Returns:
        redirect address (for controllers) if method invoker has no rights to edit updatedUser user

      • userHasRightsToEditOrDeleteUser

        public boolean userHasRightsToEditOrDeleteUser(User caller,
                                               User target)
        Checks if user A has rights to edit or delete user B.
        Parameters:
        caller - user A
        target - user B
        Returns:
        true is user A has right to edit or delete user B, false otherwise

      • addDriversFromFile

        public void addDriversFromFile()
        Load names and surnames from text files and generates drivers based on them. One driver per city.

      • addDriversFromFile

        public void addDriversFromFile(String namesFileName,
                               String surnamesFileName)
        Load names and surnames from text files and generates drivers based on them. One driver per city.
        Parameters:
        namesFileName - name of text file with names
        surnamesFileName - name of text file with surnames

      • setUsersWorkedHoursToZero

        public void setUsersWorkedHoursToZero()
        Sets the amount of hours at work during current month at 0 for all users. This method is only called when month change occurred.
